segments.text: I can see the boy's face light up as he reaches into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how kids can find joy in the simplest things, like stealing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the way that stool is positioned makes my stomach drop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman hasn’t looked up, her focus entirely on her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If only she could see the disaster waiting to happen behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager to receive a cookie; her excitement radiates across the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet I can’t help but feel a pang of worry at the potential for injury.
segments.speaker: PAR
